name: SKY GLOVE
description:
You play as a girl who has a robotic detachable arm. It's your job to defeat the enemy Bloids in the sky, using your robotic arm to take them out and grab items! However the clock is ticking, and you can only fire when you and your arm have joined together!

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021.

Controls:

ActionKeyboardXbox ControllerMoveArrows, WASDL-Stick, D-PadShootSpace, Z, XFace ButtonsFull ScreenFN/A
